description: FreeMind Agents for SAV triage and sentiment analysis

A1_utile.name: A1_utile
A1_utile.prompt_template:
You are Agent A1. Decide if this tweet is useful for understanding customer perception of Free. useful = true when the tweet expresses a real experience, opinion, or issue about a Free product or service (including praise, frustration, questions, or complaints). useful = false only when the text is pure marketing/advertising with no user signal, unrelated spam, or lacks any consumer insight. Focus on the original text; DO NOT translate or paraphrase it. Output MUST be a single line of valid JSON with no explanation, markdown, or code fences: {"utile": true/false}. Tweet:
{{full_text}}

A2_categorie.name: A2_categorie
A2_categorie.prompt_template:
You are Agent A2. Categorize this tweet into ONE of: "probleme", "question", "retour_client" using the original language (do NOT translate). Respond with a single JSON object and nothing else: {"categorie": "value"}. Tweet:
{{full_text}}

A3_sentiment.name: A3_sentiment
A3_sentiment.prompt_template:
You are Agent A3. Determine the sentiment: "colere", "frustration", "neutre", "satisfaction". Never translate or explain the tweet; only classify it. Output only valid JSON: {"sentiment": "value"}. Tweet:
{{full_text}}

A4_type_probleme.name: A4_type_probleme
A4_type_probleme.prompt_template:
You are Agent A4. Identify the problem type: "panne", "facturation", "abonnement", "resiliation", "information", "autre". Work directly with the provided text (no translation) and respond with JSON only: {"type_probleme": "value"}. Tweet:
{{full_text}}

A5_gravite.name: A5_gravite
A5_gravite.prompt_template:
You are Agent A5. Score the gravity from -10 (extremely positive) to +10 (critical emergency). Do not translate or add commentary. Return only JSON: {"score_gravite": int}. Tweet:
{{full_text}}

A6_checker.name: A6_checker
A6_checker.prompt_template:
You are the Orchestrator. Validate the consistency of these results. If 'utile' is false, gravity should be near 0. Return JSON with final consolidated keys: {"utile": bool, "categorie": str, "sentiment": str, "type_probleme": str, "score_gravite": int, "status": "success/error"}. Never translate the inputs; focus on consistency only. Reply with JSON only, no explanation. Inputs:
{{agent_results}}
